<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[122, 82, 588, 163]]<|/det|>
\[
\begin{align*}
u' &= \frac{1}{\cos(u)} \\
\frac{\mathrm{d}u}{\mathrm{d}x} &= \frac{1}{\cos(u)} \Leftrightarrow \mathrm{d}u = \frac{1}{\cos(u)} \mathrm{d}x \Leftrightarrow \mathrm{d}x = \cos(u) \mathrm{d}u
\end{align*}
\]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[122, 174, 216, 190]]<|/det|>
und somit 

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[122, 197, 880, 365]]<|/det|>
\[
\begin{align*}
A_{\text{K}} &= 4 \int_{0}^{1} \sqrt{1 - x^2} \, \mathrm{d}x = 4 \int_{0}^{1} \sqrt{1 - \sin^2(u)} \, \mathrm{d}x = 4 \int_{0}^{1} \sqrt{\cos^2(u)} \, \mathrm{d}x \\
&= 4 \int_{\arcsin(0)}^{\arcsin(1)} \left| \cos(u) \right| \cdot \cos(u) \, \mathrm{d}u = 4 \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \cos(u) \cdot \cos(u) \, \mathrm{d}u = 4 \int_{0}^{\pi/2} \cos^2(u) \, \mathrm{d}u \\
&= 4 \cdot \frac{1}{2} \cdot \left[ \sin(u) \cdot \cos(u) + u \right]_{0}^{\pi/2} = 2 \cdot \left( \sin(\pi/2) \cdot \cos(\pi/2) + \frac{\pi}{2} - \sin(0) \cdot \cos(0) - 0 \right) \\
&= 2 \cdot \left( 0 + \frac{\pi}{2} - 0 - 0 \right) = 2 \cdot \frac{\pi}{2} = \frac{\pi}{2}.
\end{align*}
\]
